subject: customs duties and fees - #SSN4544
description_text:
Hello,

I am contacting you regarding my order #SSN4544

When I was placing the order, the information on the website indicated that
the item would be shipped from the *EU warehouse (Germany)*. However, I can
see from the tracking information that the package is actually being
shipped from *China*.

As you know, shipping from Germany to Poland does not involve any
additional customs duties or VAT. Now that the package is coming from China
and its value exceeds â‚¬150, I will be charged *23% Import VAT* and customs
clearance fees by the courier in Poland (approximately 60-70 USD extra).

Since I chose the EU shipping specifically to avoid these additional costs,
could you please clarify this situation? Will you reimburse me for the VAT
and customs fees I will have to pay upon delivery?

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
Kamil Adamowski
